outputs.output_descr:
Output 3.1 30 water and sanitation facilities and services improved in three areas. 

Output 3.5 Improved conditions for agriculture development and the promotion of environment awareness including through 60 small infrastructures projects in three areas.

Output 3.6 30 community based electricity facilities and services improved in three areas 

Output 3.7  9 culture and tradition related sites rehabilitated in three areas

Output: Key national partners are better able to undertake participatory planning, budgeting and implementation

Output:GoI has strengthened regional and sub-regional mechanisms to support intergovernmental dialogue in a constructive and participatory manner.
